1.title: Caillou Grounds Himself

episode of.title: Ashtonimations' Caillou Gets Grounded Show (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: In a desperate attempt to get ungrounded, Caillou decides to ground himself.

2.title: Caillou Gets A Job At The Drunken Clam

episode of.title: Ashtonimations' Caillou Gets Grounded Show (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Caillou is disappointed that PAYDAY 2 is expensive and decides to get a job at the Drunken Clam so he can buy it for himself.

3.title: Caillou Uploads His Dad's Nudes On Instagram

episode of.title: Ashtonimations' Caillou Gets Grounded Show (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: While browsing his dad's computer, Caillou comes across his dad's nudes and uploads them to instagram.

4.title: Caillou Poops On The Movie Theater Screen

episode of.title: Ashtonimations' Caillou Gets Grounded Show (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Caillou is forced into seeing "The Boss Baby" in theaters and shows just what he thinks of that by pooping on the screen at the movie theater.

1.title: Caillou Refuses To Eat His Cabbage

episode of.title: Ashtonimations' Caillou Gets Grounded Show (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Boris had made Caillou some cabbage for breakfast, but Caillou refuses to eat it no matter what Boris says.

2.title: Caillou Flushes Mr. Fishy Down The Toilet

episode of.title: Ashtonimations' Caillou Gets Grounded Show (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: After the events of the previous episode, Caillou is angered and decides to exact his revenge by flushing his dad's fish companion down the toilet.

3.title: Caillou Learns German Insults On Duolingo

episode of.title: Ashtonimations' Caillou Gets Grounded Show (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: After his anger and boredom get the better of him, Caillou decides to register an account on Duolingo and learn some insults in the German language so that he can hurt his dad's feelings.

4.title: Caillou Watches Breaking Bad

episode of.title: Ashtonimations' Caillou Gets Grounded Show (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Before Boris leaves for work, he advises Caillou not to watch any PG+ Shows. Caillou of course, disobeys Boris' warning and decides to binge-watch Breaking Bad on Netflix.

5.title: Caillou Brings His Dad's Galil AR Assault Rifle to School

episode of.title: Ashtonimations' Caillou Gets Grounded Show (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Annoyed that he has to go to school, Caillou decides to bring his dad's Galil AR assault rifle to school. After being tattled on by his best friend, Caillou takes it out on his teacher and ends his life.

6.title: Caillou Throws His Dad's Credit Card Down The Manhole

episode of.title: Ashtonimations' Caillou Gets Grounded Show (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: After being forced into a walk to the grocery store, Caillou decides to take his dad's credit card and throw it down a manhole.

7.title: Caillou Deletes His Dad's Blog

episode of.title: Ashtonimations' Caillou Gets Grounded Show (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: Behind Caillou's back, Boris has secretly been writing a blog about Caillou's daily shenanigans for over half a year. Caillou finds out and decides to delete his dad's blog.

8.title: Caillou Beats Up Leo

episode of.title: Ashtonimations' Caillou Gets Grounded Show (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: Boris decides to surprise Caillou by inviting Leo over for a playdate. Everything goes fine until Caillou gets jealous of Leo's special guest treatment and decides to beat him up for it.

9.title: Caillou Takes His Dad's Car For A Drive

episode of.title: Ashtonimations' Caillou Gets Grounded Show (TV Series 2017– )

9.plot: Caillou's Saturday morning boredom leads him to take Boris' car out for a drive, where he gets into an accident.

10.title: Caillou Copies Off Of Leo's Test

episode of.title: Ashtonimations' Caillou Gets Grounded Show (TV Series 2017– )

10.plot: Caillou returns to school and meets his new teacher Mr. Nelson, who informs the class that he will be picking up where Mr. Lucas left off (with a test). Caillou finds the test undoable, so he decides to cheat off of Leo's test.

11.title: Caillou Meets Bart Simpson

episode of.title: Ashtonimations' Caillou Gets Grounded Show (TV Series 2017– )

11.plot: Boris agrees to look after his old friend Homer's son Bart for the day, and Caillou and Bart instantly become friends and cause mischief around the house.

12.title: Caillou Installs A Virus On The School Computer

episode of.title: Ashtonimations' Caillou Gets Grounded Show (TV Series 2017– )

12.plot: Hoping to be excused from school, Caillou installs a virus on the school computer.

13.title: Caillou Misbehaves At The Grocery Store

episode of.title: Ashtonimations' Caillou Gets Grounded Show (TV Series 2017– )

13.plot: Caillou is forced to the grocery store with Doris to do some shopping. Caillou gets bored and decides to misbehave and throw things around the store.

14.title: Caillou Gets A Job At Overwaitea

episode of.title: Ashtonimations' Caillou Gets Grounded Show (TV Series 2017– )

14.plot: Caillou asks Boris to buy him a video game, and Boris refuses, so Caillou takes up a job at the local grocer: Overwaitea.

15.title: Caillou Throws An Apple At His Grandmother

episode of.title: Ashtonimations' Caillou Gets Grounded Show (TV Series 2017– )

15.plot: Sitting on the ottoman, bored and out of ideas, Caillou decides to wake his grandmother up in a cruel way by chucking an apple at her.

16.title: Caillou Dresses Up As His Teacher

episode of.title: Ashtonimations' Caillou Gets Grounded Show (TV Series 2017– )

16.plot: Mr. Nelson leaves the class for a brief meeting with Mr. Johnson, and Caillou decides to dress up as Mr. Nelson and prank his class.

17.title: Caillou Forgets Ashtonimations' 15th Birthday

episode of.title: Ashtonimations' Caillou Gets Grounded Show (TV Series 2017– )

17.plot: Caillou can't remember Ashton's birthday for the life of him.

18.title: Caillou Prints Counterfeit Money

episode of.title: Ashtonimations' Caillou Gets Grounded Show (TV Series 2017– )

18.plot: Angered by Ashton's success as a YouTuber, Caillou decides to print counterfeit money and frame his dad for the heinous crime.

19.title: Caillou Pulls Down His Teacher's Pants

episode of.title: Ashtonimations' Caillou Gets Grounded Show (TV Series 2017– )

19.plot: To cure his boredom, Caillou decides to embarrass Mr. Nelson by pulling his pants down in front of the whole class.

20.title: Caillou Posts A Picture Of His Teacher With His Pants Down On Instagram

episode of.title: Ashtonimations' Caillou Gets Grounded Show (TV Series 2017– )

20.plot: After the events of last episode, Caillou posts the picture he took of Mr. Nelson with his pants down on Instagram for the internet to see.

21.title: Caillou Turns Into A Woman

episode of.title: Ashtonimations' Caillou Gets Grounded Show (TV Series 2017– )

21.plot: Caillou is sick of being a boy and decides to use Plotagon Logic to convert himself into a woman. He finds that being a woman has its perks, and uses them to his mischievous advantage.

22.title: Caillou Excludes Leo From A Class Project

episode of.title: Ashtonimations' Caillou Gets Grounded Show (TV Series 2017– )

22.plot: The class starts group assignments whilst Leo is absent. Leo returns the following day and Caillou refuses to let him join his group.

23.title: Caillou Misbehaves On A Road Trip

episode of.title: Ashtonimations' Caillou Gets Grounded Show (TV Series 2017– )

23.plot: Doris surprises Caillou, telling him they're going to Six Flags for a weekend road trip. Caillou is disappointed, and makes it his mission to ruin the road trip for everyone.

imdb.title: Ashtonimations' Caillou Gets Grounded Show
plot: Meet Caillou, an 11 year old bald kid who likes to cause mischief. Join him in his misadventures all around Plotacity.::Ashtonimations
